law.catch_line: The Comptroller shall issue an appropriate license to each applicant who meets the requirements of t...

text.section: The Comptroller shall issue an appropriate license to each applicant who meets the requirements of this subtitle for a license to act as a manufacturer, storage warehouse, subwholesaler, vending machine operator, or wholesaler.
The clerk shall issue to each applicant who meets the requirements of this subtitle a license to act as a retailer.
